events.title: TBDIWSG Tuesday Information Session ZOOM
events.description:
Thunder Bay & District Injured Workers Support Group 
Dec 16 ‚Äì Guest Kevon Stewart, District 6 Director, USW

Kevon will discuss in the presentation:
‚Ä¢ The criminal liability and prosecution of organizations who do not follow the Westray law.
‚Ä¢ Why enforcement of the Westray law is not currently happening.
‚Ä¢ The actions USW District 6 is taking for more dedicated investigators, prosecutors, and training for legal and police officials.

Contact us at tbiwsg@gmail.com if you want to join us for these Zoom Sessions!
https://thunderbayinjuredworkers.com/tuesday-events/
